The root cause of the bug is in the line:
Joining Values with Comma
We can use the 'String.join()' method to combine all values for the same header with commas. Here's the modified code:
```java
header(name, String.join(", ", values));
```
This will correctly handle multiple values for the same header and pass the test.

Using Stream API
We can also use the Stream API to combine all values for the same header with commas. Here's the modified code:
```java
header(name, values.stream().collect(Collectors.joining(", ")));
```
This will correctly handle multiple values for the same header and pass the test.
